text: ovunta erehi vana bavata (ayudha) balayada, (huru purudu) yuda asvayinda, obata pramanavat andamata oba (sæmavitama) sudanam kara tabanu. memagin allahge saturavada, obage saturavada obata biya gænviya hækiya. movun hæra (saturange) venat samaharek sitinnaha; ovunva oba handunanne næta. allahma ovunva handunanneya. (memagin ovunvada obata tiggæssimata pat kala hækiya. me sandaha) allahge margayehi oba kumak viyadam kalada, (ehi phalavipaka) obata purana vasayenma laba denu æta. (ehi) podiyak ho obata asadharanayak karanu nolæbe
